rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG1201, IAR1113, OHS1000}
Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}

description: This unit introduces basic techniques of visualisation for the exploration and communication of interior architecture. These techniques are examined, and then applied to the communication of interior architectural experiences throughout the design process. The student will use a range of media including digital modelling, and develop proposals in two and three dimensions.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
